title: (x) Peter Baker Photography - (similar to) Venus Light Condensed {Marc O}
author: franz

comments.content:
Very, very similar to Venus Light Condensed:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/venus/urw-t-light-condensed/testdrive.html?s=PETER+BAKER+PHOTOGRAPHY&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/venus/urw-t-light-condensed/testdrive.html?s=PETER+BAKER+PHOTOGRAPHY&p=48)   
   
(The only difference I see is the bowl of the R.)
Actually, now that I look at the G, I wonder if the sample isn't in fact Venus Light Condensed, just squooshed a bit.
